comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: This fountain is most likely located at Plaza de los Fundadores. The camera facing northwest, towards Sangremal Street ( today Independencia Avenue). Across the street, behind the camera, Templo de la Santa Cruz is found. In www.loc.gov/pictures/item/det1994023663/PP/ you'll see the fountain, the plaza, and the church photographed by William Henry Jackson Greetings from Torreón, Coahuila, Mexico Dr. Roberto Duarte Plastic Surgeon
